original_text: They used blue, purple and red material, as well as good linen, to make the curtain for the entrance of the yard. A worker used special skills so that it looked beautiful. It was 9 metres wide and 2.2 metres high. All the curtains around the yard were 2.2 metres high.
korean_text: 뜰의 휘장 문을 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가늘게 꼰 베 실로 수 놓아 짰으니 길이는 스무 규빗이요 너비와 높이는 뜰의 포장과 같이 다섯 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: They used blue, purple and red material
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 파란색, 보라색, 빨간색 재료를 사용했습니다

sentences.original_text: to make the curtain for the entrance of the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰 입구를 위한 커튼을 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: All the curtains around the yard
